tool_description: Creates detailed audience profiles and identifies content interests based on demographic and behavioral data.

target_demographics.description: Demographic categories: age_18_24, age_25_34, age_35_44, age_45_54, age_55_plus, students, professionals, parents, entrepreneurs

content_categories.description: Content categories to analyze interest for

geographic_region.description: Geographic focus: global, north_america, europe, asia, other

error_messages: Invalid demographic: Use valid demographic categories from the specified list
Empty content categories: Provide at least one content category to analyze
Invalid geographic region: Use one of [global, north_america, europe, asia, other]
Category limit exceeded: Maximum 15 content categories allowed
usage: Specify target_demographics and content_categories, optionally add geographic_region and industry_focus. Returns audience insights and content preferences.

audience_segments.description: Identified audience segments based on demographics

interest_scores.description: Interest scores (0-100) for each content category

preferred_formats.description: Preferred content formats for each segment

engagement_patterns.description: Typical engagement behaviors for each segment

content_recommendations.description: Specific content recommendations for each audience segment
